com.here.platform.location.core.geospatial.javadsl

Interface ProximitySearch<GC,E>

  • Type Parameters:
    GC - The type of the search center (WGS84 geocoordinates type)
    E - The type of element to search for

    public interface ProximitySearch<GC,E>
    An interface for finding elements within a specific radius around a center.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Iterable<ElementProjection<E>> search(GC center, double radiusInMeters)
      Returns all elements within a given distance around a given center.

    • Method Detail

      • search

        java.lang.Iterable<ElementProjection<E>> search(GC center,
                                                double radiusInMeters)
        Returns all elements within a given distance around a given center.

        Parameters:
        center - Search around these geocoordinates
        radiusInMeters - Search inside the circle defined by this radius
        Returns:
        The results that are within radiusInMeters of center, including items on the boundary
